name: Burger Flipper 3D
description:
In this simple yet addictive clicking game, players take on the role of a busy burger chef who must serve as many hungry customers as possible. Click on the screen to sell those burgers faster and to earn more money. Save enough money to unlock Fast food and fancy restaurant. Can you rise to the challenge and become the ultimate burger master? Play now to find out!

Game Design: Dario Jurčević, Mirna Tominac

Level Design: Dario Jurčević

Programming: Mirna Tominac
